title: Falling
description: What is Celestra Caine? Who is she and did she ever existed? The Faders and the Others clash at the Underground, sending everything into a tailspin. Celestra is pulled into more intrigue, more danger, and more romance, as she discovers who she is and why everyone wants to get her in Book 2 of the FADE series.FADE - Available Now Falling (FADE #2) - Available Now Forgotten (FADE #3) - 2012 For exact date of release, sign up for New Releases at theEDGEbooks.com.
author: Kailin Gow
